name: planted.kebab
description: The ultimate late-night food: crispy, juicy, and made from peas and rapeseed oil.
longDescription: Craving a kebab? Our planted.kebab delivers all the crispy, juicy goodness you love - made entirely from plants. Crafted from peas and rapeseed oil with an honest spice blend, it's perfect in wraps, on salads, or loaded into a pita with all your favorite toppings. The after-party food reimagined.
ingredients: Water, pea protein (25%), rapeseed oil, spices (cumin, coriander, paprika), pea fiber, natural flavoring, salt, vitamin B12
preparation: Pan-fry for 4-5 minutes until crispy and heated through. Serve in wraps, pitas, or over salad with your favorite sauces.

steps.title: Heat
steps.description: Hot pan with a splash of oil.

steps.title: Load
steps.description: Pita, wrap, or bowl. All the toppings. All the sauce.
